intent_atoms.description: Validation rule VR-014 must reconcile edit list presentation spans with mvhd, tkhd, and mdhd durations and surface unsupported playback rates.
Streaming coverage ensures media duration diagnostics defer until the owning mdhd payload is parsed, preserving order-agnostic validation.

BoxValidator extended with a stateful edit list rule that tracks movie- and track-level context, computes tolerance-aware tick differences, and emits targeted messages for gaps, overruns, and rate anomalies.
